translation.en: [bubbling]
[Emily] Have you ever wondered what makes things glow?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui fait briller les choses ?

translation.en: Today, we're gonna focus on one of my favorites.
translation.fr: On va parler d'une chose que j'adore.

translation.en: Things that are...
fluorescent.
♪ Emily's Wonder Lab ♪
♪ Stay curious and keep exploring ♪
translation.fr: Soyez curieux et explorez à l'infini

translation.en: Hey, little scientists, come on in. -Hi, Miss Emily! -[Emily] Hello.
Welcome!
-[cheerful music playing] -Now, art is pretty cool, right?
[kids] Yeah!
But we're not doing art today.
translation.fr: Mais on ne va pas en faire.

translation.en: -We're doing science. -Yes!
translation.fr:
On fait des sciences. - Ouais  !
- Ouais  !

translation.en: Yes!
I wish there were a way
that we could combine the two.
Ooh. Maybe there is.
Today, we are gonna make our own fluorescent paint.
translation.fr:
Aujourd'hui, on va faire
notre peinture fluo.

translation.en: -Whoa. -That's gonna be fun.
Emily wants us to make fluorescent paint!
translation.fr: On va faire de la peinture fluo !

translation.en: Could she be any cooler?
[Emily] But before we start making fluorescent paint,
translation.fr: Mais avant de faire de la peinture fluo,

translation.en: we just have to turn off the visible light...
translation.fr: on doit éteindre la lumière visible, et...

translation.en: -...and turn on... -[kids] Wow!
the invisible lights.
-Cool! -Whoa!
I love everything that glows, so today is my new favorite day.
translation.fr:
J'adore ce qui brille.
J'ai trop de chance.

translation.en: Like, it's a dream, but in real life!
translation.fr: C'est un rêve, mais dans la vraie vie !

translation.en: This isn't just the ground. This is the floor-escent!
translation.fr:
Ce n'est pas un sol ordinaire.
C'est le fluo-sol !

translation.en: Follow the path on the ground to your stations
and get all of your materials,
-then come back to the table. -[Arya] Let's do this!
I love stuff that glows!
Toys that glow, glow sticks.
Neon T-shirts, signs, lights. It's like a glow party!
translation.fr:
T-shirts, enseignes, lumières.
C'est une soirée super fluo !

translation.en: Emily, I wonder, what kind of lights are these?
Ooh, good question, Zaela.
These lights that we are seeing right now are known as black lights,
translation.fr: Ces lumières, ce sont des lumières noires.

translation.en: and they're emitting a lot of ultraviolet light.
-[boy] Cool! -Wow.
Emily, why do sunglasses say "UV protection?"
translation.fr: Les lunettes de soleil protègent des UV ?

translation.en: So, "UV" stands for ultraviolet.
It's protecting you from the ultraviolet light that comes from the sun.
translation.fr:
Elles protègent
des rayons ultraviolets du soleil.

translation.en: It's really, really energetic, but that means that it can hurt our eyes,
translation.fr: Ça peut être dangereux pour nos yeux

translation.en: and it can even hurt our skin.
-Sunscreen... -Oh, yeah. ...also has UV protection.
translation.fr: La crème solaire protège aussi des UV.

translation.en: -That's cool. -I never knew that.
I thought I know everything about science.
No, Emily knows more!
translation.fr: Non, Emily en sait plus que moi !

translation.en: Hey, Emily, if UV light comes from the sun,
translation.fr: Si les UV viennent du soleil,

translation.en: then why don't we see it like this light? [Emily] That's a very good question, Zaela.
translation.fr:
- pourquoi c'est pas comme ça ?
- Excellente question.

translation.en: You know the colors of the rainbow? Red, orange, yellow, green, blue... [Zaela] Yeah.
translation.fr:
Prends les couleurs de l'arc-en-ciel.
Rouge, orange, jaune, vert, bleu.

translation.en: [Emily] At the end, you have indigo and violet. [kids] Oh. [Emily] After violet comes ultraviolet.
translation.fr:
À la fin, on a de l'indigo et du violet.
Et après le violet, l'ultraviolet.

translation.en: Light that we can't really see with our eyes.
translation.fr: Une lumière qu'on ne voit pas.

translation.en: So black light has ultraviolet light, but it also has a little bit of violet light.
translation.fr:
La lumière noire a de la lumière UV
et un peu de lumière violette.

translation.en: That's why we see it as kind of this purply glow.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que c'est violet.

translation.en: -[boy] What? -That's so cool.
-Ultraviolet? -Yeah.
It sounds like the name of an alien planet.
translation.fr: Ça fait un peu planète extraterrestre.

translation.en: It does sound like the name of an alien planet.
So, fluorescents work with ultraviolet light. The invisible light.
translation.fr:
Le fluo marche avec les rayons UV.
La lumière invisible.

translation.en: It's really, really highly energetic light.
And when it hits the fluorescent paint,
translation.fr: Quand elle touche la peinture fluo,

translation.en: the fluorescent paint absorbs some of that energy
translation.fr: elle absorbe une partie de cette énergie

translation.en: and releases the rest of it with light that we can actually see with our eyes.
translation.fr:
et libère le reste
avec de la lumière qu'on peut voir.

translation.en: -That's cool. So cool. -Cool.
So to see that further, -I have a ping-pong ball. -Yeah.
translation.fr:
Pour l'illustrer,
j'ai une balle de ping-pong.

translation.en: Okay, this ping-pong ball is like our ultraviolet light.
translation.fr: Cette balle représente les rayons UV.

translation.en: And pretend that the table is like our fluorescent paint.
translation.fr:
On va dire que la table,
c'est notre peinture fluo.

translation.en: So, the ultraviolet light comes in really fast,
translation.fr: Les rayons UV arrivent très vite,

translation.en: at the speed of light, with highly energetic particles,
translation.fr: à la vitesse de la lumière.

translation.en: and some of the energy is absorbed into the table,
translation.fr: Une partie de l'énergie est absorbée

translation.en: and some of that energy is released back to us with light we can see.
translation.fr:
et une autre est renvoyée
avec de la lumière qu'on voit.

translation.en: So when the ball bounces back up,
that's the light we see with our eyes.
[Arya] Cool!
Yeah. And one ping-pong ball is cool, but it doesn't really illustrate the entire process,
translation.fr:
Une balle, c'est cool,
mais ça n'illustre pas tout le processus,

translation.en: because that's happening with every single atom inside our fluorescent paint.
translation.fr:
parce que ça se passe
avec chaque atome de notre peinture fluo.

translation.en: And there are trillions and trillions of atoms
translation.fr: Il y a des trillions d'atomes

translation.en: -inside the fluorescent paint. -Trillions?
-Trillions? -Whoa!
So instead of one ball, we need tons of them.
translation.fr:
Au lieu d'une balle,
il nous en faut des tonnes.

translation.en: Science is so fun!
Don't tell Emily, but I'm keeping this one. Pink is my favorite color.
translation.fr:
Ne dis rien à Emily, je la garde.
C'est ma couleur préférée.

translation.en: [kids] Yeah!
When all those ping-pong balls were coming down,
that was like the highly energetic rays of ultraviolet light,
translation.fr: c'était comme les rayons UV énergiques,

translation.en: and when they bounced back up,
that's like the spectacular parade of photons that we see as different colors of light.
translation.fr:
c'était comme la parade de photons
qu'on voit comme des couleurs.

translation.en: That is so cool.
Emily makes science fun.
Ping-pong balls and glow-y stuff?
translation.fr: Des balles et des trucs lumineux ?

translation.en: Wait a minute, is this a surprise birthday party for me?
translation.fr: C'est une fête surprise pour moi ?

translation.en: So, you guys ready to make some fluorescent paint yourself?
translation.fr: Alors, on fait de la peinture fluo ?

translation.en: -[kids] Yeah! -Okay.
Get your mixing bowls ready,
we're gonna create three different colors of fluorescent paint.
translation.fr:
on va créer trois couleurs
de peinture fluo.

translation.en: These are the insides of highlighters...
...which contain chemicals that are fluorescent.
translation.fr: Ce sont des produits chimiques fluo.

translation.en: And so you want to take the color of your choice
and start pouring a little bit of water over the top
while you squeeze it.
Look how that glows in the light.
Can I combine colors? -You can combine colors. -Whoa!
translation.fr:
- Je peux mélanger des couleurs ?
- Bien sûr.

translation.en: This is about experimenting. -Do whatever you want. -Yeah!
translation.fr: Les expériences, ça sert à ça.

translation.en: [Emily] The other thing you want to do
is we're gonna do a little scoop of cornstarch,
translation.fr: c'est ajouter une cuillère de maïzena

translation.en: just to thicken up our paint.
-All right? -Oh, my fingers are glowing!
-Your fingers are fluorescent. -Cool!
[Emily] Oh, my gosh. -Look at Nathan's face! -Whoa!
Your face is fluorescent.
-Really? -Yeah!
[Mason] We're glowing! We're glowing!
[Arya] I'm glowing! I'm glowing!
Ooh, this experiment makes me so happy. The messier, the better!
translation.fr:
J'adore cette expérience.
Plus c'est sale, plus j'aime !

translation.en: I feel like a scientist.
Oh, no!
No!
I put too much in.
Oh, don't worry about it.
-Science is all about trial and error. -Oh, you're right.
translation.fr: Les sciences, ce sont des essais ratés.

translation.en: We're gonna add more cornstarch to thicken it up.
translation.fr: On va ajouter de la maïzena.

translation.en: Look how much this is glowing.
[Mason] This is amazing.
-Scientists, are you ready to go paint? -[kids] Yeah!
Okay, take your materials and let's go over to our canvas.
translation.fr:
Allez près de la toile
avec votre matériel.

translation.en: [boy] Okay, guys. Wow.
[Emily] Look at that.
[Zaela] It is gonna be a masterpiece.
I love painting. It's all over my hands and my hair.
-I'm going to paint my nails green! -[laughing]
It's awesome!
Remember, art is all about exploring new boundaries.
translation.fr:
L'art, c'est explorer
de nouvelles limites.

translation.en: And art and science is about expressing yourself.
translation.fr:
Et avec l'art et les sciences,
on s'exprime.

translation.en: So, put down those paintbrushes,
and put your body into it.
♪ These kids are glowing in the dark ♪
translation.fr: Ces enfants brillent dans le noir

translation.en: ♪ They're glowing in the dark, yeah Glowing in the dark ♪
translation.fr:
Ils brillent dans le noir Brillent dans le noir
Ils brillent dans le noir

translation.en: ♪ They're glowing in the dark ♪
translation.fr:
Brillent dans le noir
Ils brillent dans le noir

translation.en: ♪ These kids are glowing in the dark They're glowing in the dark, yeah ♪
translation.fr: Ces enfants brillent dans le noir

translation.en: Science is messy, and I'm all about messes. [laughs]
translation.fr: En sciences, on se salit, j'adore.

translation.en: ♪ How do they do it? ♪
♪ How do they glow? ♪
-♪ Did they eat some magic nachos? ♪ -One more.
Yeah!
♪ Glowing on their skin And on their clothes ♪
I look a mess!
♪ I bet Emily knows ♪
♪ Why those kids are glowing in the dark Glowing in the dark, yeah ♪
translation.fr: Pourquoi ces enfants brillent dans le noir

translation.en: ♪ Glowing in the dark They're glowing in the dark ♪
-[kids cheer] -[Emily] Okay, little scientists,
translation.fr:
Ils brillent dans le noir Mes petits scientifiques,
aujourd'hui, on a étudié les rayons UV,

translation.en: today we learned all about ultraviolet light,
translation.fr:
Mes petits scientifiques,
aujourd'hui, on a étudié les rayons UV,

translation.en: fluorescent paint,
and all about how to combine art
with science.
And remember, stay curious...
[all] And keep exploring!
♪ Emily's Wonder Lab ♪
♪ Stay curious and keep exploring ♪
translation.fr: Soyez curieux et explorez à l'infini

translation.en: For today's at-home experiment, we are going to make our very own lava lamp
translation.fr:
Pour notre expérience à la maison,
on va faire une lampe magma

translation.en: using the power of density.
Now, remember, all kid scientists need a grown-up's approval.
translation.fr: grâce à la masse volumique. Un adulte doit donner son accord.

translation.en: So, for this one, you need a little bit of water, a glass, like this,
translation.fr: Il faudra un peu d'eau, un verre doseur,

translation.en: some vegetable oil,
salt,
and to go with the theme of the day, we have some phosphorescent powder and a UV light,
translation.fr:
et pour rester dans le thème,
on a de la poudre fluo et une lampe UV,

translation.en: because we wanna make our lava lamp glow.
translation.fr: car on veut faire briller notre lampe.

translation.en: So, the first thing you wanna do
is fill your glass most of the way
with water.
And then, you wanna add your vegetable oil.
So, if we watch what happens here, watch closely,
translation.fr: Regardez bien ce qui se passe.

translation.en: because the vegetable oil is rising to the top.
That's because vegetable oil is less dense than water.
translation.fr:
C'est parce qu'elle est moins dense
que l'eau.

translation.en: It's lighter than water, so it rises to the top.
translation.fr: C'est plus léger, donc ça remonte.

translation.en: Now, to start our lava lamp effect,
translation.fr: Pour notre effet de lampe magma,

translation.en: we have some salt here.
Salt is heavier than water, so it's gonna wanna fall to the bottom.
translation.fr:
Il est plus lourd que l'eau
donc il va tomber.

translation.en: So when I add it here,
you can see what happens.
It's grabbing onto the molecules in the oil, and taking down some of that oil with it.
translation.fr:
Il s'agrippe aux molécules de l'huile
et en fait tomber avec lui.

translation.en: But once it gets down to the bottom,
the salt dissolves in water,
translation.fr: le sel se dissout dans l'eau,

translation.en: and you can see the oil starts rising to the top again.
translation.fr:
et on voit
que l'huile commence à remonter.

translation.en: And we're seeing that same effect that we had before.
But we want to make it glow, right?
translation.fr: Mais on veut que ça brille.

translation.en: So let's add some phosphorescent powder.
translation.fr: Alors ajoutons de la poudre fluo.

translation.en: And we're gonna make this glow really bright orange.
Mix, mix, mix, mix.
Okay, so, now, all we need is our UV light
so we can see this glow in action.
Look at that, that worked so well!
And the fun part about this
is that you can do this again and again.
And look at that, look how cool that is.
That is how you make your very own glowing lava lamp.
translation.fr:
Et voilà comment on fabrique
une lampe à lave.

translation.en: ♪ Emily's Wonder Lab ♪
♪ Stay curious and keep exploring ♪
translation.fr: Soyez curieux et explorez à l'infini

translation.en: ♪ Emily's Wonder Lab ♪
♪ Stay curious and keep exploring ♪
translation.fr: Soyez curieux et explorez à l'infini.

translation.en: ♪ Yeah! ♪
♪ Emily's Wonder Lab ♪
♪ Stay curious and keep exploring ♪
translation.fr: Soyez curieux et explorez à l'infini
